data.title: Candied Bacon Chocolate Chip Cookies by Sinful Delights Bakery & Candy Co. — Kickstarter
data.name: Sinful Delights Bakery & Candy Co.
data.description: Sharing the deliciousness of candied bacon and chocolate in one lovely, savory cookie.

data.title: Bakin' Bakery Food Truck by Renee LaLonde — Kickstarter
data.name: Renee LaLonde
data.description: A sweet and savory bacon infused food truck. Inspired by fresh local, seasonal, and foraged ingredients. Heavily community influenced.
